This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(xtable)

```

```{r}
anscombe

```

```{r}
ansc <-
  bind_cols(
    anscombe %>% 
      select(matches("x")) %>% 
      gather(dataset, "x"),
    anscombe %>% 
      select(matches("y")) %>% 
      gather(key, "y")
  ) %>%
  select(-key) %>% 
  mutate(dataset = gsub("x", "", dataset)) %>%  
  as_tibble()
      
  
```

```{r}
ansc %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>% 
  summarise(
    mean_x = mean(x),
    stdev_x = sd(x),
    mean_y = mean(y),
    stdev_y = sd(y)
  
  )
```

```{r}
ansc %>% ggplot(aes(x,y, color = dataset)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol = 2)

```
